resources.string:
Cannot open book :( A file is missing.
You may be able to navigate to other sections in the book to continue reading this book.
Sorry either no details of book were saved, or there is a problem with the stored book. Please use another menu option to find a book to read.

Gestures are used to control the player. Tap the center of the screen to stop and restart the current audio. Swipes (where you drag your finger in a straight line on the screen, then lift the finger) are used for the remaining gestures: Swipe Up to go to the previous audio segment at the current depth in the book. Swipe Down to go to the next audio segment at the current depth in the book. Swipe from left to right to increase the depth. Swipe from right to left to decrease the depth.
Swipe diagonally down and left to rewind. Swipe diagonally down and right to fast-forward.
DAISY books can contain material at a single depth, or at multiple depths e.g. to represent chapters (where the depth might be level 1) and sections (where the depth might be level 2).
The SD Card appears to be in use (mounted); can you unmount it, then try again?

This book seems to be a full text book. However, DAISY full text books are not supported yet. Please request the feature on the project\'s web site at http://code.google.com/p/android-daisy-epub-reader/issues/list so we know that people actually want this feature.
